xxl.core.util.reflect
Class Reflections

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.util.reflect.Reflections

public class Reflections
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides some static methods which make heavily use of the Java reflection mechanism.

Method Summary

          Calls the main method of a class cl with a given parameter array.

          Determines if the type is supported by the convertStringToDifferentType method above.

          Returns a function which converts Number types into the desired Wrapper class type, which is given by returnClass.

Parameters:

type - Class object of the desired return type.
Returns:
the value parsed from the String.

getNumberTypeConversionFunction

public static Function<java.lang.Number,? extends java.lang.Number> getNumberTypeConversionFunction(java.lang.Class<?> returnClass)
Returns a function which converts Number types into the desired Wrapper class type, which is given by returnClass.

Parameters:
returnClass - Desired return Class. If a primitive class is given, then also the associated wrapper class is used.
Returns:
The conversion function.

typedArrayCursor

public static Cursor<java.lang.Object> typedArrayCursor(java.lang.Object valuesArray)
Returns a Cursor iterating over the elements of the array. This method is applicable for all kinds of arrays.

Parameters:
valuesArray - Array of arbitrary base type.
Returns:
Cursor iterating over the elements of the array.
